about_the_game:
Prepare for an even more intriguing and challenging experience in O.W.L Projekt 2! Embark once again on the journey with Elysion, now in a renewed world with stunning graphics and improved gameplay mechanics. Master new skills and face unprecedented challenges as you explore handcrafted levels, each filled with complex puzzles and lethal traps like spikes that appear at unexpected moments.

Furthermore, beware of the new fast enemy that makes escaping even more intense, demanding precise movements and quick thinking. Use the Sanctum Staff to manipulate objects, and now, with the introduction of portals of different colors, transport yourself to various areas in the blink of an eye. The new levels are more challenging than ever, taking full advantage of these groundbreaking mechanics.

Features

  • Innovative Puzzle Mechanics: Manipulate blocks, drag platforms, discover secret passages, climb ladders in a 3D isometric environment, avoid traps, use portals to reach new areas, and escape enemies.

  • Progressive Challenges: Each set of levels introduces new challenges and mechanics, keeping the game constantly engaging and stimulating.

  • Captivating Story: Follow Elysion in his mission to escape the Watchers, the mysterious guardians of the experimental project that created him.

  • Unique Aesthetics: Enjoy a charming new look and an intriguing level design.

  • 50 Exclusive New Levels: Explore and solve puzzles in 50 distinct stages, each offering a unique and rewarding challenge.

Help Elysion escape the enhanced Watchers and uncover even deeper secrets as you adapt to the changes and overcome all obstacles in your path. With O.W.L Projekt 2, the adventure reaches a new level of strategy and excitement.

name: O.W.L Projekt 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 11.0c
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Explore O.W.L Projekt 2 with Elysion in a renewed world, facing even more complex challenges, fast enemies, and new mechanics like portals of different colors. Use the Sanctum Staff to overcome traps and escape the Watchers in an exciting adventure.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
